# https://github.com/github/gitignore/blob/main/Global/Vim.gitignore
#

# Backup files made by hand
*.[Bb][Aa][Kk]
*.[Bb][Aa][Kk]-*
*-[Bb][Aa][Kk]
*-[Bb][Aa][Kk]-*
*-[Oo][Rr][Ii][Gg]
*-[Oo][Rr][Ii][Gg]-*

*.zip

# Swap
[._]*.s[a-v][a-z]
!*.svg  # comment out if you don't need vector files
[._]*.sw[a-p]
[._]s[a-rt-v][a-z]
[._]ss[a-gi-z]
[._]sw[a-p]

# Session
Session.vim
Sessionx.vim

# Temporary
.netrwhist
*~
## Auto-generated tag files
#tags
# Persistent undo
[._]*.un~
